data.eml:eml: The Conopidae of Costa Rica (Diptera) (Part 1: Conopinae – Conopini & Tropidomyiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stuke, Jens-Hermann, Skevington, Jeffrey H. (2007): The Conopidae of Costa Rica (Diptera) (Part 1: Conopinae – Conopini & Tropidomyiini). Zootaxa 1528: 1-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273851
